cdata.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 170, Number 129 (Friday, August 9, 2024)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. WILLIAMS of New York:H.R. 9345.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Section 8 of Article I of the U.S. Constitution.The single subject of this legislation is:To direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development toestablish a grant program to award amounts to eligibleentities to pay for the cost of certain home maintenance orrepair projects for veteran homeowners, and for otherpurposes.[Page H4986]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.title: Safe Housing Assistance for Veterans Act

item.title: Safe Housing Assistance for Veterans Act
Safe Housing Assistance for Veterans Act

To direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a grant program to award amounts to eligible entities to pay for the cost of certain home maintenance or repair projects for veteran homeowners, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
